name: Brandon logs in on the website and purchases a new laptop

testSteps.description: Given That Brandon logs in successfully and attempts to purchase a new laptop

When Brandon lists the laptops and selects the third one and adds it to the shopping cart
| laptop |
| HP ENVY - 17T TOUCH |
Then Brandon visualizes the correct laptop was successfully choose and shows the laptop name <laptop>

userStory.narrative: Brandon wants to purchase the ENVY 17T touch Laptop on the website
